favourite.article: Praise the Lord that when we turn our hearts to Him the veil is taken away!
Lord, we turn our hearts to You!
2 Corinthians 3:16 "But whenever their heart turns to the Lord, the veil is taken away." The moment our heart turns to the Lord, the veil is taken away. This is far better than "shall be" taken away.

I searched Youtube for this song but couldn't find it.. Finally when I google searched for it, google directed me to your site.. Thanks and praise the Lord.. This is such a beautiful hymn..
I'm a new believer.. got baptised 2011 Good Friday (April)
I've listened to this hymn during last year, year-end conference, it reminds me of the conference so much.. Missed those times with the Saints etc..
God bless you, Jeremiah
